snippet: Michael D. Shear discusses the Romney campaign's mixed response to the Supreme Court's health care ruling, Jeff Zeleny looks at Rob Portman's potential as a leading Republican vice-presidential candidate, and Ashley Parker reports as Romney takes a...
abstract: Michael D. Shear discusses the Romney campaign's mixed response to the Supreme Court's health care ruling, Jeff Zeleny looks at Rob Portman's potential as a leading Republican vice-presidential candidate, and Ashley Parker reports as Romney takes a few days of vacation.

headline.main: TimesCast Politics: Romney and Health Care
